Name: Treasure of Barracuda
About the game: A Point & Click Puzzle Adventure , exploring the Treasure of Barracuda , a real brick built puzzle box. Find the treasures within using The Map , your Old Grandfathers Amulet , and Solve the Riddle ! Fully buildable and functional in real life as well! Support now on Lego Ideas and this can become a real Lego set! Includes Easy and Medium difficulties. Hard difficulty unlocked when we reach 5000 supporters on Lego Ideas!
